The clown shoes are an untradeable cosmetic item. They are part of the clown outfit, which can be obtained by completing one of the Halloween holiday events that occur once per year.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room, as part of the 2018: Clown suit set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
8 November 2018
(update)
  • The event version was renamed from "Clown shoes" to "Null".
  • The event version's "Wear" option was removed.
  • The event version's "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
  • The event version's value was decreased from 1 to 0.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is likely a reference to the line "You'll float too" said by Pennywise the Clown in the 1990 television miniseries It.

[[File:Clown shoes detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''clown shoes''' are an untradeable cosmetic item. They are part of the [[clown outfit]], which can be obtained by completing one of the [[Halloween event|Halloween]] [[holiday events]] that occur once per year.

{{Costume storage|toy box|[[Clown outfit|2018: Clown suit]] set|set=true}}

{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 8 November 2018
|update = The Portal Nexus
|change =
*The event version was renamed from "Clown shoes" to "Null".
*The event version's "Wear" option was removed.
*The event version's "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
*The event version's value was decreased from 1 to 0.

==Trivia==
*The examine text is likely a reference to the line "You'll float too" said by Pennywise the Clown in the 1990 television miniseries ''{{WP|It (miniseries)|It}}''.
